Tagline.title: Fullstack Developer · UI/UX Designer · AI Specialist · Prompt Engineer

ParrafoIntro.title: My history in the world of Technology begins in the second half of the first decade of 2000, a time when, believe it or not, the startups and large companies that today dominate the market, also began.

ParrafoDos.title: During these 16 years of professional career and continuous training, I have specialized in the following tasks:

DescriptionTask1.title: I design unique and innovative user experiences for AI-based products, taking into account the needs, expectations, and emotions of end-users, as well as the goals and vision of clients.

DescriptionTask2.title: I develop comprehensive solutions with artificial intelligence that work on any platform and device, using the best practices and technologies to create attractive, intuitive, and accessible interfaces, as well as robust, scalable, and secure systems.

DescriptionTask3.title: I apply artificial intelligence to any domain or problem to optimize processes, generate insights, and create value, using advanced techniques of machine learning, natural language processing, computer vision, and other related areas.

DescriptionTask4.title: I create personalized and detailed prompts for OpenAI's ChatGPT that meet any goal or purpose, using an iterative and user-centered process to define, design, and evaluate prompts that fit the needs and requirements of each client or use case.

XpDescripcion1.title: Since early 2023, I have been focusing on Artificial Intelligence, providing consultancy services to individuals or companies of any size, who want to adapt to AI, as well as working as a prompt engineer, UX and UI designer, and front-end and back-end developer for AI projects.

XpDescripcion2.title: At the end of 2020, I was co-founder and UX/UI design lead at TRADEBOG, a tech startup specialized in Social Shopping marketplace platforms, distributing exclusively beauty and wellness products, both from own brands and third parties.

XpDescripcion3.title: While living in Mexico City, Madrid and Buenos Aires, I took advantage of the clients and contacts that I had accumulated during the constant travels that I had during that time and created a digital marketing agency, working with companies such as Coca-Cola FEMSA, Grupo Herdez and El Corte Inglés.

XpDescripcion4.title: My job was to lead and supervise the digital projects of the key accounts of this digital marketing agency, present in 3 countries.

XpDescripcion5.title: After graduating from university and taking a couple of courses in technology and digital marketing, I co-founded a digital marketing and advertising agency, specializing in SMEs and startups. Despite this, we came to have as clients companies like G4S and Coca-Cola FEMSA Colombia.

DescripcionClienteDestacado1.title: Designed digital marketing campaign and created social profiles for Subway and Pizza 1969 brands.

DescripcionClienteDestacado2.title: UI and UX design, frontend development and monthly administration of a home security systems informative website for Colombia.

DescripcionClienteDestacado3.title: Creation of the official fanpage of Subway Colombia. Community Management and follow-up. Reached the first 3,000 likes.

DescripcionClienteDestacado4.title: 360-degree digital consulting for Herdez Food Services, one of the divisions of this Mexican corporation. Development of app and webapp for the Food Services area of Grupo Herdez.

DescripcionClienteDestacado5.title: Project Manager of the digital team in charge of the development of the Christmas section of the official app of El Corte Inglés. Maintenance and delivery of monthly analytics of the section.

DescIAPromptEngineering.title: ChatGPT 4 was used to build the following ReactJS components from scratch. Each component is fully functional and serves as a widget. The cognitive model was instructed on how to use the widgets, connect to API services, use libraries and generate CSS code. The programmer only had to fix minor bugs in the dependencies.

DescIAGeneracionDeImagenes.title: Creation, retouching and enhancing all types of images for artistic, creative, advertising or commercial use. Through curated and detailed prompts, we can create anything from professional studio-quality product photography to portraits, illustrations, vector compositions, and more.

DescIAConsultoriaImp.title: I advise personal projects, ventures, startups, corporations, companies and basically anyone who needs to implement Artificial Intelligence in their operational or business model, or who wants to save time and money on daily repetitive tasks by assigning them to a cognitive model.

DescUXUIDesign.title: Using technologies such as ReactJS, Flutter, TailwindCSS and others, I design unique and innovative user experiences for artificial intelligence based products, taking into account the needs, expectations and emotions of the end users as well as the goals and vision of the clients.

UXUIDesignDescription1.title: Graphical interface design, user interface development, and front-end code development.

UXUIDesignDescription2.title: Graphical interface design, user interface development and front-end and back-end code development.

UXUIDesignDescription3.title: Coordinate development projects and the app and web platform, as well as data analysis and metrics.
